English: At the start of battle, switch to White Spirit Gauge.
At the start of battle, switch to Yellow Spirit Gauge.
Click the buff to consume 1 Mana (invalid if Mana is insufficient), and cast a Spirit Slash corresponding to the current Spirit Gauge level.
Chinese: 点击buff消耗一点法力值（法力值不足则无效），根据当前气刃斩段数释放对应等级气刃斩

English: At the start of each turn, gain 1 Spirit Gauge level.
Chinese: 每回合开始时，获得一层气刃

English: When removed, deal 5 instances of Pain damage equal to 20% of Attack Power.
Chinese: 移除时，造成5次攻击力20%倍率的痛苦伤害

English: When using a skill, if an enemy's action countdown is 0, restore 1 Spirit Gauge level.
Chinese: 自身使用技能时，若有敌人的行动倒计时为0，回复一层气刃

English: Cannot act. The next damage taken is reduced to 1, and a counterattack dealing 150% of Attack Power is launched.
Chinese: 无法行动 将受到的下一次伤害变为1，并发动攻击力150%的反击

English: When using Spirit Slash, Spirit Gauge levels are not reduced.
Chinese: 使用气刃时，不会减少气刃的层数

English: When reaching level 3, the next Spirit Slash will become Spirit Roundslash, and the Spirit Gauge levels will be reset.
Chinese: 达到三级时，下一次气刃斩将改为气刃大回旋斩，并清空释放层数。

English:
Change Spirit Slash combo to Courage Spirit Slash combo.
Change Spirit Release Helm Breaker to Courage Spirit Slash III.
Chinese:
将气刃斩连段改为刚气刃斩连段
将练气解放无双斩改为刚气刃斩Ⅲ

English: Leave it to me! I'll carve a path with this Long Sword!
Chinese: 放心交给我吧，就用这把太刀砍出一条路来！

English:
Lv2: Gain 1 Spirit Gauge level at the start of each battle.
Lv4: Gain an additional Spirit Gauge level at the start of battle.
Lv5: Gain 1 Spirit Gauge level at the start of each turn.
Chinese:
Lv2 每场战斗开始时获得一层气刃
Lv4 战斗开始时额外获得一层气刃
Lv5 每回合开始时，获得一层气刃

English: A mysterious man who always wears a mask. No one in the Ark seems to have seen his true face. He uses armor and a Long Sword derived from Rathalos' power to provide frontline support for the investigation team.
Chinese: 一位始终戴着面具的神秘男子，方舟内似乎没有人见过他的真容，使用源于火龙力量的盔甲和太刀作为武器，为调查团提供正面支援。

English: I'll find a spot to sharpen my blade.
[A] I'll learn a sword technique too!
[B] Can a Long Sword even do that...?
[B] Rathalos... a monster, huh? Must be cool.
[B] Is that red armor dyed with blood?
[A] This is the Rathalos S set!
[A] Kid, you use a Long Sword too?
[A] Two of them? Show me a move.
[B] Only armor can ensure safety in battle.
Chinese: [B]只有盔甲才能保证在战斗中的安全啊。

English: [A] Hey, your Spirit Slash almost hit me!
Chinese: [A]喂，你的气刃斩差点打到我啊

English: [B] Haha, I'll be more careful next time.
[A] Uh, from some kind of monster.
[B] Using a defensive stance to counterattack... Good tactic.
Chinese: [B]使用防御架势反击吗...不错的战术

English: [A] I only started doing that after getting this sword.
Chinese: [A]我也是有了这把刀后才这么做。

English: [A] You feel just like a Rathalos.
[B] From which angle should I break your stance?
[A] You look just like a Liberi.
Chinese: [A]你这样子，长得可真像一个黎博利。

English: [A] Your staff looks like a big hammer...
[B] Is Rathalos' fire stronger, or mine?
[B] Can your sword block my bullets?
[A] If my Iaido is precise, it can!
[B] Why is even Eve doing Iaido stances...
Chinese: [B]怎么连伊芙也开始摆出居合的动作...

English: [A] Haha, that's the charm of the Long Sword.
[B] Why do you always wear a mask?
Chinese: [B]你又是为什么一直戴着面具

English: [A] You look familiar... Have I seen you before?
Chinese: [A]有点眼熟，我以前是不是见过你

English: [A] But you didn't look like this before.
During the countdown, if an enemy's countdown reaches 0, increase Spirit Gauge level by 1, restore 1 Mana, and immediately cast this skill.
Chinese: 倒计时期间，若有敌人的倒计时变为0，则提升一层练气等级，回复1点法力值，立刻释放此技能。

English:
After use, consume all Spirit Gauge levels.
If an enemy's countdown is 1, reduce their next attack's power by 30% and crit rate by 50%, restore all Spirit Gauge levels, and the next Spirit Slash becomes Spirit Roundslash.
Chinese:
使用后消耗所有“气刃”
若敌人倒计时为1，使其下一次攻击攻击力降低30%，暴击率降低50%，回复所有气刃，下一次“气刃”直接变为气刃大回旋斩

English:
On hit, launch 7 follow-up attacks. Follow-up damage scales with Spirit Gauge level (12%, 24%, 48%).
If the character is level 6, the next Spirit Slash becomes Spirit Release Helm Breaker.
Chinese:
命中后发动七次追击，追击伤害与练气等级挂钩（分别为12%，24%，48%）
若角色等级为六级，命中后将下一次气刃斩改为练气解放无双斩

English: Apply follow-up attacks based on Spirit Gauge level (12% each, 5, 10, or 15 times).
Chinese:
根据气刃等级施加每次12%追击
（依次为5，10，15次）

English: On hit, generate a "Spirit Helm Breaker" card (discarded after 2 turns, gains Exclude).
Chinese: 若命中，生成一张“气刃兜割”（2回合后弃牌，放逐）

English: After use, increase Spirit Gauge level by 1.
Chinese: 使用后提升一层练气等级

English: On hit, consume all Spirit Gauge levels and launch follow-up attacks based on consumed levels (70%, 150%, 400%).
Chinese:
命中时消耗所有气刃等级
并根据消耗的气刃等级发动等次的追击（依次为70%，150%，400%）

English: If an enemy's action countdown reaches 0 during the countdown, immediately cast and restore 1 Mana.
Chinese: 若在倒计时有敌人行动倒计时变为0，则立刻释放并恢复一点法力值

English: If an enemy's action countdown reaches 0 during the countdown, immediately cast and restore 1 Mana.
Chinese: 若在倒计时有敌人行动倒计时变为0，则立刻释放并恢复一点法力值

English:
If an enemy's action countdown reaches 0 during the countdown, immediately cast and restore 1 Mana.
After use, increase Spirit Gauge level by 1.
Chinese:
若在倒计时有敌人行动倒计时变为0，则立刻释放并恢复一点法力值
使用后提升一层练气等级

English: After using a skill, grant Rathalos S Blackhorn 2 Spirit Gauge levels.
Chinese: 使用技能后，使火龙S黑角获得两层气刃
